synopsis.text:
He avily in debt and fresh out of college, Amawa Hibiki is eager to secure a job as an athletics teacher. Despite his qualifications, he faces rejection from the local middle school, as the principal has a deep-seated disdain for male teachers. Desperate to prove her wrong and earn a living, Hibiki transforms himself into a woman with the help of his landlady.

Disguised as a female teacher, Hibiki successfully lands the job at the school, which is on the verge of becoming an all-girls institution. Determined to prove that men can be passionate and dedicated teachers, he must navigate the challenges of maintaining his secret identity while dealing with the unwanted attention from his students.

As he stumbles through awkward situations and struggles to keep his true gender hidden, Hibiki's unconventional teaching methods make him a popular figure among the students. However, his new life is fraught with complications, including the affections of one particular female student named Kuzuha Fuuko. Can Hibiki continue to conceal his true identity and prove his worth as a teacher, or will his deception ultimately lead to his downfall?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
